title: [failed] TC-001-17: Progress file schema has entries with `id`, `title`, `status`, `attempt_count`, `last_agent_exit_code`, `updated_at`
description:
Test case TC-001-17 resulted in status: failed.
Notes: Schema does not match approved test plan.
Evidence: RefactorExecutionProgressSchema has id, title, status, agent_exit_code, updated_at. Test plan requires attempt_count, last_agent_exit_code. Implementation omits attempt_count and uses agent_exit_code not last_agent_exit_code.
Correlated requirements: US-001, FR-4
